New Records: Yusei Kikuchi matched a franchise record with exactly 17 outs in four of his first five starts since joining Houston at the trade deadline
Key Match Events: Yusei Kikuchi struck out 12 over seven strong innings
Yanier Diaz and Jeremy Pena struck the decisive blows against Royals left-hander Cole Ragans
Bobby Witt Jr. slugged his 29th home run with two outs in the eighth off reliever Hector Neris
Pre-Game Insights: Astros manager Joe Espada emphasized the importance of strong bullpen performance
Post-Match Reflections: Astros manager Joe Espada praised Yusei Kikuchi's performance, saying he had all his pitches working, both sides of the plate
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Royals have dropped four consecutive games, while the Astros have won four in a row
In other action, Shohei Ohtani connected on his 44th home run of the season in the Los Angeles Dodgers' 8-6 win over the Arizona Diamondbacks
